snippet: Improvements in the landscape for initial public offerings appeared to have stalled a bit on Thursday, as newly public shares of the Oaktree Capital Group tumbled below the offer price.
abstract: Improvements in the landscape for initial public offerings appeared to have stalled a bit on Thursday, as newly public shares of the Oaktree Capital Group tumbled below the offer price.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Amid Tough Day for Newly Public Companies, Oaktree Tumbles
